QuestData.Title: Thaelin's Quick Fix
QuestData.Description:
Those orcs sure like to pile things up in one place. That gave me an idea...
I've built this ingenious device for ya! When you get near a target, it'll let you know, and you can deploy it for a big, satisfying, kerBOOM!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Thunderlord Cache, Blackrock Forge, and Log Storage.
QuestData.RewardText: Nothing like a good explosion to warm the heart.
